attributes.action: Make all religious holidays a national holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow people of all faiths to celebrate other religous holidays such as Christmas is already national, as its unfair how only some people recive holidays when with christianity every gets off, and yet its allowed to have the day off its unfair on businesses too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
